entry.name: Human Caco-2 proteome and N-glycome during differentiation
entry.description: Park, D, Brune, KA, Mitra, A, Marusina, AI, Maverakis, E, Lebrilla, CB. Characteristic Changes in Cell Surface Glycosylation Accompany Intestinal Epithelial Cell Differentiation: High Mannose Structures Dominate the Cell Surface Glycome of Undifferentiated Enterocytes, Molecular and Cellular Proteomics: submitted.
